created_by: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections, Endgame), oscd.community
name: Bypass UAC via CMSTP
description: Detect commandline usage of Microsoft Connection Manager Profile Installer (cmstp.exe) to install specially formatted local .INF files
false_positives: Legitimate use of cmstp.exe utility by legitimate user
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Mm][Ss][Tt][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.pe.original_file_name:/[Cc][Mm][Ss][Tt][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\/[Ss].*/ OR /.*\-[Ss].*/ OR /.*\/[Aa][Uu].*/ OR /.*\-[Aa][Uu].*/ OR /.*\/[Nn][Ii].*/ OR /.*\-[Nn][Ii].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\cmstp.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:CMSTP.EXE) AND process.command_line:(*\/s* OR *\-s* OR *\/au* OR *\-au* OR *\/ni* OR *\-ni*))`
